title: Video Conferencing Strategies to Improve Digital Well-Being in Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Online Learning Platform Usage Experience and Basic Digital Communication Skills
context.additional_context: Learners studying in an online non-real-time environment to enhance language-related job competencies must acquire effective interaction methods using video conferencing tools

learning_goals: Learners apply three or more strategies to efficiently manage videoconferencing time
Learners explain principles for designing videoconferencing environments to maintain digital wellness
Learners practice communication techniques that enhance focus and engagement during online interactions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
